alert.note: Alert for Bedford; Coffee; Giles; Marshall (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 9:43AM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Marshall, Coffee, northern Giles and Bedford Counties through 1030 AM CDT... At 943 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles southwest of Murfreesboro to 9 miles west of Shelbyville to 11 miles southwest of Lewisburg. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Shelbyville, Lewisburg, Manchester, Tullahoma, Chapel Hill, Cornersville, Wartrace, Bell Buckle, Lynnville, Normandy, Beechgrove, Raus, Summitville, Belfast, Deason, Farmington, Unionville and Arnold AFB. This includes the following highways... Interstate 65 between mile markers 18 and 35. Interstate 24 between mile markers 95 and 118. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
